content: knitted waistcoat in drops alpaca bouclé and drops kid-silk piece is knitted bottom up in stocking stitch with edges in garter stitch i-cord and opening in the side pattern ab-159 yarn group c and a **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio 200-200-250-250-300-300 g colour 2020 light beige and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio 75-75-100-100-100-100 g colour no 15 beige **buttons** drops button no 630 4 pieces for all sizes **needles** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 14 stitches in width and 17 row vertically in stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality needle size 6 mm = 10 x 10 cm
